TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewLinkColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

summary.span: 表示 控件中包含链接的单元格的列。

span.span: Represents a column of cells that contain links in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是种特殊的类型的类用来以逻辑方式承载该响应用户单击的单元。The class is a specialized type of the class used to logically host cells that respond to user clicks. 类是类似于类但提供了不同的用户体验，可能更适合在某些情况下，例如，显示存储在数据库表中的 URL。The class is similar to the class but provides a different user experience that may be more appropriate in certain situations, such as displaying a URL stored in a database table. 若要显示每个单元格的同一链接文本，请设置属性设置为`true`并设置属性设置为所需的链接文本。To display the same link text for every cell, set the property to `true` and set the property to the desired link text. 一个都有一个关联中每个的相交。A has an associated in every that intersects it. 此列类型的默认排序模式是。The default sort mode for this column type is . 若要响应用户单击链接操作，处理事件。To respond to user link clicks, handle the event. 此外可以使用事件来响应该单元格在任意位置单击。You can also use the event to respond to clicks anywhere in the cell. ## Examples 下面的代码示例上设置属性。The following code example sets properties on a . 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

para.span: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 此外应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于在列的单元格中显示活动链接的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link within cells in the column.

value.span: 一个表示用于显示所选择的链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color used to display a link that is being selected.

value.span: 默认值为用户的 Internet Explorer 设置链接的颜色，在处于悬停状态。

span.span: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the color of links in the hover state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例初始化属性，以便该链接会变为白色，当用户选择它。The following code example initializes the property so that the link turns white when the user selects it. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于创建新单元格的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.

value.span: 一个的列中的所有其他单元格都以它为模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
The default value is a new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数类初始化此属性设置为新创建。The constructor for the class initializes this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 更改单元格模板的属性不会立即影响列的现有单元格的用户界面 (UI)。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 这些更改只会明显后重新生成列 (例如，通过对列进行排序或通过调用方法)。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用作为模板。The following code example demonstrates how to use a as a template for a . 对列中的任何单元格所做的样式更改会影响所有列的单元格。Style changes made to any cell in the column affect all of the column's cells. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示列的单元格中链接的行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of links within cells in the column.

value.span: 一个值，该值指示链接行为。

span.span: A value indicating the link behavior.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例初始化此属性设置为，它可让链接将显示如何选择的操作系统。The following code example initializes this property to , which lets the operating system choose how the link will display. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例初始化此属性为蓝色。The following code example initializes this property to blue. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. summary.span: 获取或设置当 为 时，列的单元格中显示的链接文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the link text displayed in a column's cells if is .
A containing the link text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本均可见如果属性设置为`true`。The text is visible if the property is set to `true`. 否则，每个单元格的链接文本填充的每个单元格的属性。Otherwise, each cell's link text is populated with the property of each cell. 您可以重写通过设置单元格的各个单元格的属性值属性设置为`false`设置列后属性设置为`true`。You can override the property value for individual cells by setting the cell property to `false` after setting the column property to `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当访问链接时，该链接是否更改颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the link changes color if it has been visited.

value.span: 如果选择; 时，该链接将更改颜色，否则为。

span.span: if the link changes color when it is selected; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当为 true，属性值用于显示已访问过的链接。When is true, the property value is used to display links that have already been visited. 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例初始化此属性，以便选择此项时，该链接将更改颜色。The following code example initializes this property so that the link changes color when it is selected. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

span.span: if the property value is displayed as the link text; if the cell property value is displayed as the link text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性，以便中这种情况下的雇员 ID 的雇员的老板，每个单元格的属性将显示为文本链接。The following code example demonstrates how to set this property so that the property of each cell, in this case the employee ID of the employee's boss, is displayed as the text link. 选择的链接，选择点移动到后上司的名称。After selecting the link, the selection point is moved to the boss's name. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display a link that has been previously visited.

value.span: 一个，表示用来显示已访问过的链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color used to display a link that has been visited.

value.span: 默认值为用户访问过的链接颜色的 Internet Explorer 设置。

span.span: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the visited link color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为 false，属性将被忽略。If the property is set to false, the property is ignored. 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例初始化此属性，以便该链接是黄色-绿色; 如果用户访问过它。The following code example initializes this property so that the link is yellow-green if the user has visited it. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]
